description: Stay Covered Get an iPod case that’s an extension of your sophisticated personality. The genuine leather combines durability with understated elegance, while the folio-style cover closes to protect your screen and opens for access to all your controls. Protection from the Inside Out The durable, structured leather and soft microfiber inner lining is a great way to keep your iPod’s surface free of scratches and scuffs, without adding extra bulk.
title: Belkin Verve Folio Case for Apple iPod Touch 4th Generation -Black/Blue
